name: Healia
headline: Modern health insurance for dual income families
description:
Healia is reinventing health insurance for dual income families. Our product enables companies to pay for the out of pocket costs of any employee that enrolls in their spouse's health insurance plan. This saves customers $10k per enrollee while providing an incredible employee perk: 100% coverage of a family's health costs.

We’re now up to 50+ customers coast-to-coast with over 40k employees using our product!

founders.name: Priyang Shah, Founder
founders.description: Priyang is a founder with 10 years of experience in healthcare, insurance, and software development. He was the 15th employee at Root Insurance (1st PM), and helped scale it to 1,500 employees and a $6.5B IPO. Previously, he was the 20th employee at Olive AI ($4.5B valuation).

# The #1 health benefit for families
## Healia enables companies to cover the expenses of employees on their spouse's health plan, saving companies $10k per enrollee
![Healia](https://www.healiahealth.com/_next/static/media/dashboard.dad20d74.svg)
# What Does Healia Do?
![Healia](https://www.healiahealth.com/_next/static/media/heart.7600d99e.svg)
The Total Care Option
The Total Care Option (TCO) is an innovative new benefit that enables companies to cover the out of pocket costs and premiums of any family members that enroll in the spouse’s health plan. This saves customers $10k per enrollee while providing an incredible employee perk: 100% coverage of a family's health costs. 
![Healia](https://www.healiahealth.com/_next/static/media/medical-clipboard.881024f0.svg)
Plan Selection Technology
23% of employees choose the wrong health plan, leading to significant costs for them and their employers. Healia's software platform fixes this by helping employees find the best health plan in under five minutes. Our technology can even analyze a spouse's health plan from another employer, ensuring families make the best choice. 
![Healia](https://www.healiahealth.com/_next/static/media/light-bulb.65fd90fe.svg)
Plan Benchmarking and Analysis
Many employers struggle to understand how their health plans compare to their competition. Healia provides clear, detailed insights into plan quality and costs, enabling employers to design better, more competitive health benefits that retain talent and lower costs.
# Healia's Impact
![Lower cost](https://www.healiahealth.com/_next/static/media/lower-costs.d421eb69.svg)
Lowers costs for you and your employees
![Boosts recruitment](https://www.healiahealth.com/_next/static/media/boosts-recruitment.21c348a2.svg)
Boosts recruitment and retention
![First](https://www.healiahealth.com/_next/static/media/first.4e2c158f.svg)
Sets your company apart
# Stress Free Savings
![Lower cost](https://www.healiahealth.com/_next/static/media/medication-on-tablet.633bce2c.svg)
Healia is up and running in under a day
![Woman](https://www.healiahealth.com/_next/static/media/woman-on-tablet.1a9371d6.svg)
Healia handles employee education
![Man](https://www.healiahealth.com/_next/static/media/man-on-tablet.580e0e86.svg)
Healia works with any insurance plan
# Contact Us
Want to see a demo or stay up-to-date on our progress?
Contact us for more information.

generated_description:
### Healia: Reinventing Health Insurance for Dual Income Families

**Overview**  
Healia is a dynamic company founded in 2022, based in Columbus, OH, and a proud participant in Y Combinator's Batch W24. It’s on a mission to transform health insurance, specifically for dual-income families, by addressing a significant gap in the market. They provide a unique solution that enables companies to cover out-of-pocket health care costs for employees enrolled in their spouse's plans, effectively saving organizations around **$10,000 per enrollee**.

**What They Do**  
Healia’s flagship offering is the *Total Care Option (TCO)*, which guarantees **100% health cost coverage** for participating families. This not only alleviates financial pressures on employees but also serves as a remarkable employee perk, thereby enhancing the overall benefits package that companies can offer their workforce.

They also tackle the common problem of poor health plan selection. With about **23% of employees choosing the wrong health plan**, Healia’s platform helps guide employees to make informed decisions in **under five minutes,** even factoring in spouse's plans from different employers. Additionally, their plan benchmarking and analysis tools provide employers insights into how their health plans stack up against competitors, which is crucial for retaining talent and optimizing costs.

**Impact and Adoption**  
Since launching, Healia has made impressive strides, serving **over 50 customers** across the nation and reaching **40,000 employees** with their innovative offering. This indicates a strong product-market fit and highlights their growing influence in the health insurance landscape.

**Benefits**  
Healia not only reduces costs for both employees and employers but also boosts recruitment and retention efforts by differentiating companies in a competitive job market. The setup is seamless—companies can get Healia up and running in **less than a day**, which is a game changer for busy HR departments. Moreover, Healia takes the reins on employee education, ensuring a smooth transition and understanding of the new benefits.

For employers looking to modernize their health benefits and provide real value to their employees, Healia stands out as a forward-thinking, impactful solution.

**Contact and Learn More**  
Curious to see how Healia can work for you or want to stay updated on their journey? Check out their [website](https://www.healiahealth.com/) for more information or to request a demo. You can also connect with them on [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/company/healia-health/about/) and [Twitter](https://twitter.com/healiahealth).

In conclusion, Healia represents a big leap towards a more family-centric approach to health insurance—addressing both financial relief and enhanced employee satisfaction. If you're a dual-income family or an employer aiming to keep your workforce healthy and happy, Healia could be a pivotal part of your benefits strategy.
